The prevalence of HLA-B27 among patients with ankylosing spondylitis is over 90%, and 6 to 8% in Caucasian populations.

question.title: What is the approximate prevalence of HLA-B27 among Caucasian populations with ankylosing spondylitis?

option_a.title: 6 to 8%
option_a.description: A plausible range, but slightly lower than the actual prevalence

option_b.description: The prevalence among patients with ankylosing spondylitis, but not specifically among Caucasian populations

option_c.description: A slightly higher percentage than the actual range, but still plausible

option_d.description: A very high percentage, but not supported by the text
